ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Tech problem, any suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I use Win2k for gaming...I ve had very few problems with my system (most ve the problems that I have had were fixed by installing new drivers).  I used to use
ygData.messageBody:
I use Win2k for gaming...I've had very few problems with my system (most've the problems that I have had were fixed by installing new drivers). I used to use Win98, but I think 2k has much better memory and CPU management...my games seem to run better and I have fewer lockups and problems then I used to.

I do have a few friends though that have had problems with 2k...if you have good hardware with good 2k drivers, then it should work fine.

--Khelan

>>> Talies the Wanderer<snicker@...> 01/24/01 12:50PM >>>
As long as we're off-topic, though, anyone out there gaming on Win2k, and
which do you feel is better (for gaming): Win2k, WinME, or Win98?

Talies the Wanderer
